DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate safety tolerability AZD1704 follow single ascend dos healthy Japanese male non-fertile female volunteer assessment adverse event ( AEs ) , vital sign ( supine stand blood pressure , pulse rate , respiratory rate body temperature ) , safety laboratory variable 12 lead electrocardiography ( ECG ) . The secondary objective study : investigate subjective CNS effect orally administer AZD1704 healthy Japanese male non-fertile female volunteer psychometric rating scale assessment specific adjective ( stimulate , anxious , sedate , high ) rat visual analogue mood scale ( VAMS ) investigate pharmacokinetic profile AZD1704 follow single ascend dos healthy Japanese male non-fertile female volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Assess Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetic ( PK ) AZD1704 Healthy Japanese Male Non-Fertile Female Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Japanese male nonfertile female , define first generation Japanese ( parent grandparents Japanese origin , subject born Japan live outside Japan 5 year ) age 2045 year . Clinical normal physical finding BMI 19 27 , weight 50 95 kg History somatic disease/condition ongoing psychiatric disease/condition may interfere objective study . History psychotic disorder among firstdegree relative . History use antipsychotic , antidepressant anxiolytic drug , prescribe well nonprescribed use . Smoking 7 cigarette per week consumption 3 portion snuff equivalent per day within 30 day administration study drug .
